text: Theo van Haren Noman (29 April 1917 â€“ 6 February 2021) was a Dutch filmmaker. He won several prizes and awards. He was born in Amsterdam. Haren Noman died on 6 February 2021 in Amsterdam, aged 103. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cinematographers Category:Dutch centenarians Category:Dutch movie directors Category:People from Amsterdam
